subject: Re: keep us in your thoughts
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
For those wanting to know more for your investigative sessions, here 
are some links to the missing daughter story.
This information may assist you with your attempt at contact.


http://www.qctimes.com/articles/2008/09/24/news/local/doc48d95b5972dae
009315224.txt?sPos=3

http://www.qconline.com/archives/qco/display.php?id=405941

http://www.wqad.com/global/story.asp?s=9062784

http://www.kwqc.com/Global/story.asp?S=9060540

http://www.whbf.com/

- Mike
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Hello Tammi,
> 
> I am very sorry this has happened to you and your family.  I pray 
for 
> the safe return of her, but if that is not possible I hope for a 
> recovery so there is closure.
> I also hope someone in our group is able to help locate an area to 
> search.  I'm sure there are some in the group who are already 
working 
> on your request.
> We have many here who have been very successful at contacting those 
> who may be able to help, using the numerous devices available.
> 
> I'm sure those involved will contact you if an answer is found.
> Again, I pray for things to work out, you are in all our prayers.
> 
> - Mike Coletta
> UFOMagazine.net
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "mamahaugs" <mamahaugs@> wrote:
> >
> > Hi I am newer to this sight I enjoy reading all your messages. My 
> step 
> > daughter Nina Ornelis disappered in the Rock River yesterday 
> afternoon 
> > around 2:30 search starts again at daybreak. and if anyone can 
> check 
> > the otherside if you happen to find out where we should be 
looking 
> > please call Tammi at 641 782-5914. My husband name is Rich. 
Thanks 
> > Tammi
> >
>
